title: Russia's Otkritie Holding to gather bids for 10 bln rbl bonds
content: MOSCOW, Aug 31 (PRIME) -- Russia’s Roseximbank, the state agent bank for guarantees to exports, plans to grant at least 20 billion rubles of loans to support hi-tech exports until the end of 2015, Dmitry Golovanov, chairman of the bank’s management board, told PRIME in an interview published Monday.
